Vendors
=======

The following table lists the vendors and tools which LSW currently supports:


+-------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------+
| Vendor                        |  Tool                                           |
+===============================+=================================================+
| Mentor Graphics               | Precision                                       |
+-------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------+
| Microsemi/Actel               | Designer                                        |
+-------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------+
